about_the_game:
Survive the Mummies!

A group of unsuspecting tourists has crashed their van into a long-forgotten pyramid, and now there’s no turning back. As they venture deeper into the tomb, they’ll face dangers lurking around every corner—but the biggest threat of all? The ancient pharaoh himself, come back to exact his revenge!

As a tourist, you’ll only have your ultra-powerful camera to protect you from the denizens of the pyramids. Your camera can charge up a blinding flash to trigger deadly traps, destroy scarabs, and even stun mummies—if you can hold out long enough. The longer you charge it, the more powerful the flash becomes, but the mummies close in fast! Will the camera charge in time, or will you be overwhelmed?

Key Features Include:

  • Outrun the Mummies: Fast-paced gameplay keeps the action moving and the stakes high.  Run away from mummies to avoid damage, or stand still to charge your camera and feel your heart racing as enemies close the gap.

  • Outsmart the Mummies: Master your environment to trap or destroy the mummies pursuing you.

  • Diverse Mechanics: New enemies and traps are introduced every few levels to keep the gameplay fresh all the way to the end.

  • Unique Characters: From a rollerblader to a drone operator, find and unlock new characters with unique abilities, movement, and cameras.

  • Loads of Content: We made this game bigger than we should have - there are 112 levels, each of which takes 2-5 minutes.  Expect over 20 hours of gameplay to enjoy your first time through!

  • Challenge Modes: Elevate your heart rate with a time attack mode, or layer on incrementally hard difficulty options that fundamentally change the way you interact with the levels.

  • Take it Easy: For those who want a more scenic experience, there are a several options for bringing the difficulty down dramatically.  Play at your own pace!

Warning

This game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.
